desc: We produce excellent quality Holsters in a small, experienced Shop. We customize for many gun setups. We use top-Grain Vegetable Tanned Leather. We also make Belts, Suspenders and other Accessories. Concealment, Duty, Field, Shoulder Rigs, Competition.

layout.text: Whether you're in Law Enforcement, Competition shooting, Hunting, or just like a good looking Holster that respects you and your gun, Ted Blocker Holsters are a symbol of quality and excellence.
